name: Zenefits
0:
”Alexa, ask Zenefits to take time off”
”Alexa, tell Zenefits to take time off on March first”
”Alexa, ask Zenefits to take time off from tomorrow to next Friday”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zenefits
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Request time off in no time at all. With Zenefits, Alexa can now help you request vacations, sick days, and more, all in a matter of seconds. Zenefits gives thousands of businesses and their employees a single place to handle all their HR, benefits, and payroll.

To use this skill, you need a Zenefits employee account set up with the Time Off app.
